name: Southwest Bean Potage
description: Potage is a thick and hearty soup. This one is sure to stick to your ribs, packing 6 g of fibre per serving.
preparation: Heat oil, onion, pepper, Minced Garlic and Black Bean Dip Mix in Multipurpose Pot over medium heat. Cover and sauté, stirring occasionally until softened; approximately 5 minutes.
Add pumpkin, beans and Bouillon, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add spinach and cook for 2 minutes or until wilted.
Serve in bowls and garnish with pumpkin seeds, lime wedges and sherry vinegar, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with warmed whole-grain pita and a refreshing glass of low-fat milk.

products.name: Minced Garlic
summary: Full, bold, garlic flavour. No chopping required.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Garden-fresh flavors of real carrot, onion, celery, and herbs—all the ingredients you would use when making a broth from scratch. Just add water!

products.name: Multipurpose Pot - 12 Cup
summary: A 12 cup, multi-use, stainless-steel cooking pot with a lid made of glass, steel & silicone rubber.
